#summary Shows how to select board games

= Introduction =

This page shows how to select board games using Rivalry.

= Details =

==1. Start RivalryUI==
 * https://dl.dropbox.com/u/1267954/rivalry/rivalryui.jnlp

==2. Select the knight tool bar button==
 * data loads from remote location
 * right pane contains the criteria
 * left pane contains the candidates

==3. Configure GUI==
 * sort a column by clicking on the header
 * right-click to show or hide a column

==4. Adjust weights==
 * double-click a weight cell to edit

==5. Filter candidates==
 * click on the filter button
 * add filter clauses
